channel.title: Goals on Jirong's sandbox
channel.description: Recent content in Goals on Jirong's sandbox

item.title: Goals
item.description: Goals One of the main motivations in starting this blog - beside experimenting and toying with different technologies & concepts - is to keep myself accountable of the goals that I set for myself. Here are the areas that I will include in my blog, Financial goals Education goals Code development goals Number of books read goals Articles written goals Number of exercise sessions goals Yearly goals This is ‘goals’ disguised as a system.
